SENT.plain: We report a congenital giant cardiac tumor that occupied the majority of left ventricular cavity with severe left ventricular inflow and outflow obstruction
The hemodynamics were similar to univentricular physiology
He was treated with prostaglandins and bilateral pulmonary artery banding
He had frequent supraventricular tachycardia associated with ventricular pre-excitation that was controlled by long-term administration of intravenous amiodarone
The patient died due to sepsis after 3 months
